original_title: Christina Aguilera: Back to Basics - Live and Down Under
overview: Christina Aguilera's breathlessly energetic, senses-frazzling live spectacular of a concert brought the house down in Sydney Adelaide, Australia. The critically acclaimed live extravaganza thrills and awes, while Christina's vocal acrobatics remind you why hers is the Voice of a Generation.
title: Back to Basics: Live and Down Under
